put.desc: Updates the specified private endpoint connection associated with the key vault.

params.name: properties
params.desc: The intended state of private endpoint connection.

200.desc: The state of private endpoint connection was updated successfully.

Retry-After.desc: (specified only if operation does not finish synchronously) The recommended number of seconds to wait before calling the URI specified in Azure-AsyncOperation.

Azure-AsyncOperation.desc: (specified only if operation does not finish synchronously) The URI to poll for completion status. The response of this URI may be synchronous or asynchronous.

default.desc: Error response describing why the operation failed.
